----- Original Message -----
From: Jonathan Hecht <jhecht@...>

> Has anyone come up with a method to use JUnit to test how GUI's work( 
> for example, are custom events initialized and fired correctly)?  I 
> have looked through the FAQ and have not come up with an answer.  The 
> problem, as I see it, is that each test would depend on user input.  
> Can you test the GUI's by firing events from components 
> programmatically?
> 

MarathonMan is worth a look. It not only allows for assertion based testing, but also full record and playback of gui testing scenarios.

http://marathonman.sourceforge.net/

... and it's free and Open Source.
